personal.name: Martin Dupont
personal.title: Senior Data Engineer
personal.summary: Experienced Data Engineer with a proven track record in developing scalable data pipelines, implementing DevOps practices, and enhancing team capabilities through effective communication and training. Proficient in Python and experienced with Microsoft Fabric and Medallion Architectures.

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer
experience.summary: Led the development and maintenance of CI/CD pipelines and Docker containerization, aligning with DevOps practices. Mentored junior developers, fostering a culture of learning and collaboration. Gained exposure to data pipeline development, laying the groundwork for advanced data engineering projects.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.summary: Collaborated in a team to develop and deploy scalable web applications, honing my problem-solving and teamwork skills. This role provided a solid foundation in software development principles, relevant to building robust data engineering solutions.
